segments.text: Hello , Jim . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To the cinema . What about coming with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thanks . I'm going home . My wife's expecting me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a pity . I believe it's a very good film .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you go to the cinema a lot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Once a week . Most nights I sit at home and watch telly
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know what's on tonight by any chance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm sorry I don't . I never read the papers till I get home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . By the way , where are you going for your holidays this year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know yet . My wife's going to her mother's for a couple of weeks . She Livesay the sea , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but I want to go to the country .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , very much . But I need peace and quiet when I'm on holiday . What are coughing to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to stay at home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Aren't you going to have a holiday abroad this year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I want to buy a car , and that's going to take every penny I've got .
segments.speaker: S1
